parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.72

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Custom Panels

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns array all info panels configured for given object or object and turret path.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[infoPanels]] unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - the concerned vehicle

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - format [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[infoPanelId1, infoPanelShortcutId1], [infoPanelId2, infoPanelShortcutId2], …]:
* infoPanelId: [[String]] - name of the info panel class as defined in vehicle config
* infopanelShortcutId: [[String]] - shortcut representation of ''infopanelId'', currently are supported only shortcuts "left" and "right"

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[infoPanels]] [unit, turretPath]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - the concerned vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> turretPath: [[Array]] - turret index

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] - format [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[infoPanelId1, infoPanelShortcutId1], [infoPanelId2, infoPanelShortcutId2], …]:
* infoPanelId: [[String]] - name of the info panel class as defined in vehicle config
* infopanelShortcutId: [[String]] - shortcut representation of ''infopanelId'', currently are supported only shortcuts "left" and "right"

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>[[infoPanels]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[vehicle]] [[player]], [0]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Arma 3 Custom Info]], [[infoPanel]], [[setInfoPanel]], [[infoPanelComponents]], [[enableInfoPanelComponent]], [[infoPanelComponentEnabled]]
</value></part></template>

[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
